name: GDKO Round 2
description:
This prototype was created for the GDKO Jam Round 2

Your toy is a Firefly jar!

Click with your mouse to move around and catch fireflies by running into them. Then come back to the dark cave to release them! It looks really cool when you have a lot to release at one time!

This game works on mobile.

Controls: 

  • left mouse click to grab tile with hair
  • right mouse click to release fireflies (or click the “release flies” button)
